title: Injunctions
context: ยง481-27 Injunctions. Any person violating or neglecting or failing in any particular to conform to or comply with this part may be enjoined by the circuit court of the State by mandatory or restraining order necessary or proper to effectuate the purposes of this part in a suit brought by the attorney general in the name of the State or by any private person in the person&rsquo;s own name. [L 1945, c 214, ยง7; RL 1955, ยง205-46; HRS ยง481-27; gen ch 1985] Rules of Court Injunctions, see HRCP rule 65.
